MemoryInfobox.description: 'Kassandra saved an interesting old Ide|lady who asked her to get rid of some Mercenary|mercenaries suspiciously funded by a Order of Hunters|secret group.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted'
MemoryInfobox.next:
Agis of the North (memory)|Agis of the North
Gaia the Fist (memory)|Gaia the Fist
Theos the Stargazer (memory)|Theos the Stargazer

General_Description: '''Taking Out the Competition''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Having rescued a foul-mouthed [[Ide|old lady]] from the [[Ischagoras Military Camp]], Kassandra was asked to deal with several [[Mercenary|mercenaries]].
Section_Dialogue:
At the old lady's request, Kassandra tracked down the three mercenaries, [[Agis of the North]], [[Gaia the Fist]], and [[Theos the Stargazer]], and eliminated them. (Complete [[Agis of the North (memory)|Agis of the North]])
(Complete [[Gaia the Fist (memory)|Gaia the Fist]])
(Complete [[Theos the Stargazer (memory)|Theos the Stargazer]]) *'''Kassandra:''' ''That's the last mercenary. I'll find the foul-mouthed old lady and take her up on that wine.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra eliminated the three mercenaries in Makedonia.
Section_Trivia: *The memory is separated into three support quests: [[Agis of the North (memory)|Agis of the North]], [[Gaia the Fist (memory)|Gaia the Fist]], [[Theos the Stargazer (memory)|Theos the Stargazer]]. All need to be complete in order to unlock [[A Good Toast]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted]]''
